summary: This is an email chain from October 2019 regarding the FBI Victim Services Division organizing briefings for victims of Jeffrey Epstein in New York and Florida. The email forwards a formal invitation letter sent to victims, outlining meeting details and logistical information.

events.title: FBI Victim Services Briefing in Florida
events.description: A meeting organized by the FBI Victim Services Division for victims of Jeffrey Epstein to learn about available victim services, held in Miramar, Florida.

events.title: FBI Victim Services Briefing in New York
events.description: A meeting organized by the FBI Victim Services Division for victims of Jeffrey Epstein to learn about available victim services, held in New York, NY.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively reaching out to victims of Jeffrey Epstein in late 2019 to provide information on available services.
Briefings were scheduled for victims in two locations: Miramar, Florida on October 15, 2019, and New York City on October 23, 2019.
The communication references an active investigation (Case Number: NY-3027571) but states specific details about it would not be provided at the briefings.
Victims were allowed to bring one support person to the meetings.
The email indicates some initial confusion because the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was mentioned in the invitation letter.
